articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Chollima Building Materials Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Chollima Building Materials Complex
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Chollima Building Materials Complex.
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the complex with a vast area, he said that he visited the complex to turn it into a leading comprehensive building materials production base in which its production is more successfully put on a Juche and modern basis.
					
					 He looked round the room dedicated to the history of the complex.
					
					 He stressed that the officials and employees of the complex should live and work, bearing deep in mind the great pride and honor of working at the modern building materials production base built under the far-sighted plan of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went round various places including the iron sheet roofing materials shop, light steel structure shop, plastic building materials shop and products exhibition to learn in detail about the production and quality of products.
					
					 He praised the complex for turning out diverse products, saying that the complex produces not only plastic sash, aluminum sash, iron sheet roofing materials, heat-proof multiple sheet and plastic tubes of various forms, sizes and colors but also iron fence, wire net fence and varieties of blocks for diverse uses.
					
					 Noting the building materials being produced by the complex are impeccable in the light of not only technical indexes and aesthetic value, he said with satisfaction that it has become possible to apply formative art to structures at a higher level by using locally produced quality building materials.
					
					 Referring to the important duty the complex is performing, he advanced tasks facing it.
					
					 Noting it is the intention of the Party to turn the complex into an icon one capable of massively producing building materials conducive to improving the people's living standard, augmenting the national power and making the country look more beautiful and putting architecture on a high-level of formative art, he said he would personally solve all the problems arising in doing so.
					
					 Calling for successfully remodeling the complex as the one which will materialize the Party's policy on locally producing building materials with locally available resources and raw materials and indigenous technology and the profitable Juche-oriented one to be proud of before the world, he said to do so is the way of successfully cultivating and bringing into bloom the seeds sown by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the complex.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets His Lao, Thai Counterparts
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets His Lao, Thai Counterparts
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, who is participating in the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum now under way in Laos, separately met and had conversations with the foreign ministers of Laos and Thailand on July 26.
					 Exchanged at the conversations were views on the issues of developing bilateral relations and strengthening cooperation in the economic field.

articles.title: DPRK Institutions Send Wreaths to Lao Embassy
articles.content:
DPRK Institutions Send Wreaths to Lao Embassy
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Relevant institutions of the DPRK sent wreaths to the Lao Embassy here on Tuesday and Wednesday in memory of Samane Vignaketh, former president of the National Assembly of Laos.
					 Laid before the photo of the deceased were wreaths sent by the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the International Department of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association and the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were An Tong Chun, vice-chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association, Mun Jae Chol, vice director general of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased before making entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Diplomatic Envoys Visit Lao Embassy
articles.content:
Diplomatic Envoys Visit Lao Embassy
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of different countries here visited the Lao Embassy on Tuesday and Wednesday and observed a moment's silence in memory of Samane Vignaketh, former president of the National Assembly of Laos.
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Service persons, people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues and portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 63rd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Many people visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Laid there were floral baskets in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial establishments and schools at all levels in Pyongyang and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the great leaders who provided the glorious tradition of victory in the war against imperialism to shine forever along with the history of the country and built the world's military power and full-fledged nuclear weapons state on this land.
					
					 Floral baskets were also laid before the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang in the names of KPA units, institutions and enterprises.
					
					 Service persons, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residing areas to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the Korean People's Army (KPA) Song and Dance Ensemble at the Ponghwa Art Theatre Wednesday, the 63rd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials of institutions, industrial establishments and universities, persons of merits and youths and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here and their wives, military attaches and their wives and other foreign guests.
					
					 The performance began with overture "July 27 March" and "Song of Proud Guards Units". Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as male solo "In Three Years of War" and chorus "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Respects to Victors of Great Age."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the Songun revolutionary feats of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They presented artistic depiction of the war victory won by the Korean people by safeguarding the dignity and honor of the country at the risk of their lives and recording the ever-victorious heroic epic in the stern tempest of history.
					
					 Women's vocal sextet "Our Dear Marshal", chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only" and other numbers truthfully represented the spirit of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to glorify the history and tradition of war victory and bring earlier the final victory in confrontation with the U.S. and building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Lays Wreath before Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Lays Wreath before Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps visited the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Wednesday, the 63rd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Members of the military attaches corps laid a wreath before the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the cemetery.
					
					 They paid tribute to the martyrs of the heroic Korean People's Army who honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country, the sovereignty of the nation and the gains of revolution during the past Fatherland Liberation War before going round the cemetery.

articles.title: Wreathes Laid before Cemeteries across Country
articles.content:
Wreathes Laid before Cemeteries across Country
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Wreathes were laid before the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri on Wednesday, the 63rd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Wreathes in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), were seen standing on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, commissions, ministries and national institutions and service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and working people in the city.
					
					 A wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK  were laid on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and a wreath in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK on the wreath-laying stand of the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri.
					
					 Laid before the cemeteries were wreathes in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, commissions, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions of education, health and media, and party and power organs, industrial establishments and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the martyrs and looked round the cemeteries.
					
					 Laid before the statues of the martyrs, cemeteries of the fallen fighters, monuments to the fallen soldiers of the KPA and cemeteries of fallen fighters across the country were floral baskets in the names of the local party and power organs, working people's organizations, units of the KPA and KPISF, industrial establishments, farms and schools and bouquets and flowers.

articles.title: July 27, War Victory Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
July 27, War Victory Day Observed in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Colorful events for celebrating the July 27, day of the war victory, were held by working people, youths and students across the country.
					 Huge crowds of people visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute in humble reverence, looking up to the portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel and people of all social standings visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and revolutionary sites associated with Kim Il Sung's leadership for war victory.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and youth and students paid their respects to victors of great age after visiting statues and cemeteries of martyrs, monuments to the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army and cemeteries of fallen fighters across the country.
					
					 Diverse performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was staged at the National Theatre in Pyongyang.
					
					 The revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" was staged by the Phibada Opera Troupe at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, a concert by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre and performance by the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Performances were given by artistes of provincial art troupes.
					
					 Workers, members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and other working people, youth and students held meetings with war veterans.
					
					 The working people and school youth and children visited the families of the war veterans and persons of wartime merits and congratulated them.

articles.title: World People on DPRK's Victory in Korean War
articles.content:
World People on DPRK's Victory in Korean War
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean War in the 1950s drew deep attention of the world people.
					 The U.S. imperialists vaunted their victory, provoking the war, but the course of the war convinced the world that the DPRK people would win the war.
					
					 Visiting the DPRK as a member of an investigation group of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers during the war, Marie-Louise Moerens, a Belgian woman lawyer, said that the Korean people were waging a victorious war and the U.S. would surely suffer a defeat from them.
					
					 A foreign correspondent, active in the DPRK during the war, called at the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army to know about the prospect of the war over the large-scale "new offensive" to be launched by the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 At that time, Supreme Commander Kim Il Sung was guiding a soldier in his studies. The soldier was to leave for a foreign country in order to learn about architectural technologies for post-war reconstruction.
					
					 Witnessing this scene, the correspondent said that his article to be written would be titled "Victory of Korea in confrontation of faith--Comrade Kim Il Sung visualizes a plan for postwar reconstruction."
					
					 At a meeting of world architects in Warsaw in Juche 41 (1952), a Brazilian architect said, expressing admiration at the master plan for postwar reconstruction presented by architects from the DPRK: History doesn't know other people more heroic and optimistic than the Korean people. Everyone will come to believe that you, the DPRK people guided by the great leader who instills indomitable will and faith, are sure to win in the war and beautiful cities and villages will be built in your country.
					
					 Today the army and people of the DPRK under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un have all turned out in the final showdown with the U.S. imperialists, with firm faith that they will always emerge victorious as they are led by the great leader.

articles.title: War Victory Day of DPRK People
articles.content:
War Victory Day of DPRK People
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- It has been 63 years since the Korean Armistice Agreement was concluded on July 27, 1953.
					 In the 1950-1953 Korean War, the DPRK people won a great victory, inflicting a disgraceful, bitter defeat upon the U.S. imperialists who boasted of the myth of its "mightiness".
					
					 The U.S. imperialists provoked the war on June 25, 1950 to destroy the just two-year old DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. hurled into the war more than 2 million troops, including one third of its ground force, one fifth of its air force and most of its Pacific Fleet, troops from its 15 satellite countries, south Korean forces and even remnants of the erstwhile Japanese army. Involved in it were "ever-victorious divisions" and MacArthur, Walker, Ridgway, Clark, Dean and many other "famous" brass hats.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors bombed every town and countryside of the DPRK and employed all the war means and methods including use of germ and chemical weapons, squandering a fabulous amount of military expenditure. 
					
					 But they could not break the will of the DPRK people who turned out in the fight to defend the nation's freedom and independence.
					
					In the war, the heroic Korean People's Army wiped out and arrested more than 1,567,000 enemy troops, including 405 000 U.S. troops, captured or destroyed at least 12,200 warplanes, 560 warships and vessels, 3 200 tanks and armored vehicles. The U.S. losses in the war were almost 2.3 times those it suffered in the Pacific war during the Second World War.
					
					 July 27 when the army and people of the DPRK won the war under the guidance of Kim Il Sung, the ever-victorious and iron-willed brilliant commander, will be remembered as the eternal war victory day with Songun Korea vigorously advancing in face of the imperialists' challenges.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youths and students took place on Wednesday, the 63rd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The dancing parties began amid the playing of the song "July 27 March" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places of Pyongyang.
					
					 The youth and students danced, recollecting the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by winning victory in the war.
					
					 Dancing to the tune of songs "Train to the Front" and "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation", they reflected their pride of being young vanguards of the heroic DPRK which wins one victory after another in the confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S.
					
					 Dancing parties took place in all provincial seats, cities and counties.

articles.title: July 27, War Victory Day of DPRK: Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
July 27, War Victory Day of DPRK: Korean in U.S.
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Ri Jun Mu, chairman of the Eastern Regional Federation of Koreans in the U.S., on July 25 contributed an article to Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of the Koreans in the U.S.
					 The opinion of the north and the south of Korea on the Korean war ignited on June 25, 1950 is quite different, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The view of the north calling the war the "Fatherland Liberation War" and the south's outlook on history that its pitiful fate inflicted by the "southward invasion by the north" was saved by the U.S. clearly distinguishes the situation in the north known for its independence from that in the south known for subjugation.
					
					 July 27 is the anniversary of the war victory by the DPRK.
					
					 It now seems that the U.S. finds it hard to bear the defeat it suffered at that time.
					
					 It is staging frantic nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK every year, indicative of its intention to ignite a war again.
					
					 The matchless Korean People's Army led by Chairman Kim Jong Un equipped with nuclear weapons declares it is capable of fighting any forms of war, a nuclear war or cyber warfare.
					
					 It has already declared that it will mercilessly wipe out provocateurs of war so that there would be no one left to sign a surrender document.
					
					 It warns the enemy to bear this in mind.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides Park Geun Hye's Hectic Diplomacy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides Park Geun Hye's Hectic Diplomacy
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea, being ignorant of where it is standing, is busy with hectic diplomacy over THAAD deployment only to draw derision and criticism of the public at home and abroad.
					 As known, Northeast Asia is a very sensitive region where interests of world major powers are intermingled complicatedly. Attention of the world public has been focused on the region where a scramble for power among big powers is getting fierce.
					
					 Specifically, the danger of a new fresh Cold War is looming on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of Northeast Asia and a nerve war and conflicts between the U.S. and big regional powers are festering in the wake of the recent decision of U.S. THAAD deployment in south Korea only to turn it into a frontline base of the U.S. for realizing its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific and an advanced base for igniting a nuclear war.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the Park group has gone so foolish as to get involved in the power scramble of the neighboring big powers, talking about "shuttle diplomacy" on "pro-north countries," only to remind one of a shrimp getting its back broken in a fight between whales.
					
					 The south Korean regime has bluffed as if it would do something significant in Northeast Asia plagued with a hot scramble of power, going here and there with such petty diplomatic signboards as "plan for building new Eurasia", "idea of achieving peace in Northeast Asia" and "self-sacrificing diplomacy."
					
					 Terming the DPRK's bolstering of military muscle with the nuclear deterrent as its pivot a "provocation" and "threat", the chief executive-led south Korean authorities have all turned out in conducting "diplomacy for soliciting pressure on the north" in league with outsiders.
					
					 When the U.S. and other "allies" found it impossible to materialize their criminal purpose through "sanctions" only, the puppet regime recklessly opted for "intensive diplomacy to win over the countries friendly to the north or sympathizing with it through pressure." 
					
					 Chief Executive Park at a recent ASEM summit solicited international support for her policy of confrontation with the DPRK, calling for "leading the north to a right change", "execution of sanctions steps" and "international efforts for cooperation over north's nuclear issue."
					
					 Traitor Park during her 20 odd foreign junkets desperately worked to solicit worldwide cooperation for escalating confrontation with the DPRK, loudly talking about "strategic partner" and "international cooperation". However, no one has regarded her group as partner for "diplomatic cooperation" but as colonial lackeys of the U.S. and a herd of rabid dogs desperate in biting the fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is quite natural that the Park group of traitors and sycophants without an iota of national self-esteem has suffered shame and humiliation while going here and there like a hungry dog to hurt the compatriots.
					
					 South Korea, which turned into a complete colony of the U.S. due to the Park group's treacherous policy of depending on outsiders, is reminiscent of Korea dating back to late 19th century to early 20th century when the country was ruined as a theatre of the scramble among big powers.
					
					 The on-going diplomatic crisis facing the group is an inevitable lot of those who have prolonged their remaining days by treachery and reliance on outsiders without any correct political philosophy and sovereignty.
					
					 The Park group is bound to meet final ruin for its acts of treachery.

articles.title: Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's Feats for War Victory
articles.content:
Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's Feats for War Victory
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Papers here Wednesday carry editorials praising the feats President Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War on its 63rd anniversary.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that Kim Il Sung was the peerless patriot and invincible and iron-willed commander as he led the Fatherland Liberation War to a brilliant victory, firmly defending the destiny of the country and nation and working military miracles to be specially recorded in the history of anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 The exploits he performed by winning the victory in the war indicate the basic way for strengthening the Juche-based revolutionary force in every way, comprehensively deal with the unique military idea, theory and methods and clearly reflect the offensive spirit of Paektu and spirit of sure victory, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung gave an origin to the Juche-based army building and the development of the self-reliant defense industry and laid a solid foundation for the victory of the Songun revolution through revolutionary practices. This is his great feat.
					
					 His exploits for war victory serve as a powerful driving force that helped open a broad avenue to the building of a prosperous country in Korean style by relying on the efforts of people.
					
					 In the great Kim Jong Un's era steady continuity is given to the history of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War in which the DPRK beat back the U.S. imperialists, and the might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea is being demonstrated before the world.
					
					 Sure is the final victory of the Juche revolution, Songun revolution and July 27 of victory will shine forever as we are led by the brilliant commander of Paektu.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all Korean people to glorify forever the DPRK's proud history and tradition of victory in war under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un and bring earlier the final victory of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Justifying Establishment of "Foundation"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Justifying Establishment of "Foundation"
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea on July 25 censured the authorities for their deceptive behavior of working hard to force the victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army into taking part in setting up a "foundation" under the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery issue, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The floor leader of the Minju Party disclosed the fact that the "government" is mulling bringing in the victims to the inaugural ceremony of the "foundation" to be held on Thursday by using money and meal as bait.
					
					 He called for proving the truth behind the deceptive farce of rubbing salt into the wounds of the victims.
					
					 The floor leader of the Jongui Party urged the Park Geun Hye regime to retract the "agreement" it opened to public unilaterally and have renegotiations with Japan from the beginning.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Protest against "Agreement" with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Protest against "Agreement" with Japan
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- South Korean students staged actions in protest against the puppet forces' sycophancy and treachery, according to south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 As already known, the students under the University Students Measure Committee for Nullification of South Korea-Japan Agreement on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army staged a demonstration on December 31 last year for the proper solution to the issue of sexual slavery.
					
					 They also held a rally and press conference before the Japanese Embassy and the girl statue to denounce the Japanese authorities for their impudence.
					
					 However, the puppet forces suppressed the students on charges of the violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration".
					
					 The organization called a press conference outside the puppet Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on July 25 to declare that it would fight against the authorities' suppression.
					
					 It demanded the "government" stop all investigations into just actions of students.

articles.title: Event for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Cuba
articles.content:
Event for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Cuba
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- An event for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Havana on July 22 under the co-sponsorship of the Cuban preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples and the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were photos dealing with exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said that the Fatherland Liberation War ended with a shining victory of the Korean people thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung, and the DPRK became the country of heroes who defeated the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 But Korea has been divided into the north and the south.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people, devoted their all to the reunification of Korea till the last moments of their lives and Kim Jong Un is making indefatigable efforts to accomplish the cause of the reunification.
					
					 Today, the U.S. is resorting to the sanctions against the DPRK while talking about its non-existent "human rights issue". It is also pushing the situation to the brink of war while bringing nuclear strategic hardware into south Korea.
					
					 We are sure that the heroic Korean people will resolutely smash the U.S. imperialists' moves and win a victory as they did in the 1950s.
					
					 We will in the future, too, fully support the Korean people in their struggle for accomplishing the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Stand Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Stand Supported by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on July 21 in support of the answer given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on July 19 and the statement made by a spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army on July 20.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry strongly accused the U.S. ambassador to Seoul of flying over south Korea by F-16 of the U.S. imperialists aggressor forces in south Korea on July 12.
					
					 The U.S. ambassador's reckless act is bullying one proving himself to be a war manic.
					
					 This fact proved once again that the U.S. is the de factor ruler of south Korea.
					
					 And this clearly showed that all the U.S. diplomats are die-hard war servants.
					
					 The OPECON of the south Korean army was transferred to the U.S. at the beginning of the Korean war in 1950.
					
					 The U.S. and the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea made public their postponement of the period of transfer of the OPECON for an indefinite period.
					
					 If the U.S. abandons the OPECON, it will be left with no other justifications to stay in south Korea and will lose any excuses to interfere in the Korean issue.
					
					 The U.S. should abandon the OPECON over south Korea.

articles.title: Stern Punishment by History Is Inevitable for Park Geun Hye: Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Stern Punishment by History Is Inevitable for Park Geun Hye: Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles denouncing the south Korean Park Geun Hye regime's treacherous and inhumane acts on its website on July 20.
					 An article titled "Stern punishment by history awaits Park Geun Hye" said: 
					
					 At the recent Asia-European Meeting (ASEM) summit in Mongolia she reeled off invectives against the DPRK. She said the north should be denuclearized and be led to make "right changes", while soliciting for "application of sanctions." 
					
					 South Korea is witnessing surging anger and protest against traitor Park who decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea by kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean opposition parties and the public condemned Park's subordination to the U.S. and strong protests have been daily occurrences across south Korea including Songju, North Kyongsang Province designated as the site for deployment of THAAD.
					
					 It is quite natural that the south Korean people point the finger at Park and urging the need to force her to step down as soon as possible in order not to suffer further misfortune.
					
					 Stern punishment by history awaits traitor Park for the treasons she is adding to what she had already committed.
					
					 Another article titled "South Korean authorities should unconditionally release the DPRK citizens" disclosed the inhumane and treacherous crimes of the Park group which prevented the DPRK citizens from meeting their families and sought to use them as scapegoats for the charade of confrontation with the compatriots.

articles.title: Events for Marking July 27 Held in Bangladesh, Nigeria
articles.content:
Events for Marking July 27 Held in Bangladesh, Nigeria
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar, photo exhibition and film show took place in Dhaka, Bangladesh and a film show at a hospital in Nigeria on July 21 on the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were photos introducing the struggle of the Korean people winning victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and creating miracles stunning the world in the building of an economic giant.
					
					 "Who Drew the 38th Parallel" and other Korean films were shown.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in Fatherland Liberation War Marked in Nigeria, Algeria
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in Fatherland Liberation War Marked in Nigeria, Algeria
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, a book exhibition at a Koryo healthcare center in Nigeria and a film show at an Algerian association between July 19 and 21 on the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were publications dealing with the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and introducing Juche Korea emerging ever-victorious in the standoff with the U.S.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched a Korean film laying bare the aggressive nature of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 A reporter and speakers including the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics said that the shining victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War was a fruition of Kim Il Sung's brilliant strategy and wise leadership, praising him for bringing about a great victory with his outstanding and original strategy and war methods and tactics.
					
					 Figures of the Koryo healthcare center in Nigeria said that the army and people of the DPRK prevailed over the enemies' numerical and technical superiority with politico-ideological, strategic and tactical superiority, wishing the Korean people greater success in building a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Materiales de Construccion Chollima
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Materiales de Construccion Chollima
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Combinado de Materiales de Construccion Chollima.
					Al presenciar el panorama del combinado levantado en el area extensa, Kim Jong Un dijo que vino para convertir la fabrica en la base prominente de produccion universal de materiales de construccion en que se realizaran de manera mas perfecta la jucheanizacion y la modernizacion.
					
					El Presidente recorrio primero la sala de presentacion del historial donde subrayo que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica deben vivir y luchar guardando en lo profundo del corazon el gran orgullo de trabajar en la moderna base productiva de materiales de construccion, erguida gracias al gran proyecto del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Y recorrio el taller de materiales de tejado de hierro, el de estructura de acero ligero, el de materiales plasticos de construccion, el lugar de exhibicion de articulos y otros lugares para estudiar en detalle el estado de produccion y la calidad de los productos.
					
					Son diferentes los productos del combinado incluyendo las ventanas de plastica y de aluminio con distintas formas, normas y colores, los materiales de techo de hierro, los contrachapados para detencion del calor, los tubos plasticos, las cercas de hierro y de red metalica, dijo.
					
					Los materiales de construccion producidos en esta fabrica son muy perfectos en el indice tecnico y el valor estetico, apunto y continuo con satisfaccion que en el futuro podemos realizar en nivel mas alto el caracter plastico y artistico de las construcciones utilizando los materiales de construccion de buena calidad, fabricadas por propia cuenta.
					
					Es muy importante el deber del Combinado de Materiales de Construccion Chollima, dijo y presento las tareas que le incumben a la fabrica.
					
					El partido tiene el proposito de convertir el combinado en la planta que pueda producir sin restriccion todos los materiales de construccion que contribuyan a la mejora de la vida del pueblo, el fortalecimiento del poderio estatal, la hermosura de la patria y la realizacion del caracter plastico y artistico en la arquitectura, senalo y prosiguio que el mismo solucionara personalmente todos los problemas pendientes.
					
					Vamos a modernizar el Combinado como fabrica en que fue materializada la orientacion del partido de producir los materiales de construccion basandose en los recursos, materias primas y tecnicas nacionales, exhorto y recalco que esto es el camino de materializar el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Presidente se fotografio junto con los funcionarios y empleados del Combinado de Materiales de Construccion Chollima.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico de EPC
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico de EPC
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio este miercoles en el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa la funcion de musica y danza del Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito Popular de Corea en ocasion del 63o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					Presenciaron la funcion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, las organizaciones de trabajadores, ministerios y organos centrales y los funcionarios, ameritados y estudiantes de los organismos, fabricas, empresas y universidades en la capital. 
					
					Fueron invitados los compatriotas de visita en la patria, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					En la funcion, iniciada con el prologo "Marcha del 27 de julio" y "Cancion de orgullo de unidades guardias", se presentaron el solo masculino "Tres anos de la guerra", los coros "Himno al Mariscal Kim Il Sung" y "Tributo a los vencedores de la gran epoca" y otras piezas de diferentes generos. 
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las proezas revolucionarias del Songun de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Demostraron en escenas artisticas la historia de victoria del pueblo coreano que en la pasada guerra coreana, defendio a riesgo de la vida la dignidad y el honor de la patria y escribio la epopeya de victorias aun en medio de los vientos y mareas de la historia.
					
					El sexteto femenino "Nuestro intimo Mariscal", el coro "Fuerzas armadas revolucionarias apoyan solo la guia del Mariscal", la cancion revolucionaria "Himno al General Kim Jong Un", etc., reflejaron bien el impetu del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de glorificar la historia y tradicion de victoria en la guerra y adelantar la victoria final en la construccion de una potencia socialista bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: RPDC se esforzara mucho por defender paz mundial, ratifica canciller Ri Yong Ho
articles.content:
RPDC se esforzara mucho por defender paz mundial, ratifica canciller Ri Yong Ho
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea eliminara de raiz el peligro de guerra nuclear, que impone EE.UU., apoyandose en el poderoso disuasivo nuclear y desplegara con dinamismo la lucha por defender la paz de la region y el resto del mundo.
					Asi dijo el canciller Ri Yong Ho, jefe de la delegacion de la RPDC, en su discurso pronunciado en la reunion ministerial del Foro Regional de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico (ASEAN).
					
					Debido al cada vez mas sustancial peligro de choque en la Peninsula Coreana, se pone muy tensa la situacion general del Nordeste Asiatico, dijo Ri y continuo:
					
					En el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, efectuado en mayo pasado, el Presidente Kim Jong Un presento la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de economia nacional.
					
					La meta de esta estrategia consiste en preparar la base de desarrollo economico sostenido y mejorar decisivamente la vida del pueblo mediante la reactivacion de la economia nacional en su conjunto.
					
					El presento tambien en ese conclave la autoctona linea de lograr la reunificacion de la patria con el modo federativo bajo la bandera de independencia nacional.
					
					Como tarea inmediata y remedio para implementarla, se propuso para el Norte y el Sur de Corea aliviar el estado de confrontacion militar y resolver todos los problemas a traves del dialogo y negociaciones.
					
					La RPDC procedio al cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal y realiza nuevos esfuerzos por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas mediante el dialogo y negociaciones.
					
					Pero, la situacion toma la corriente diferente.
					
					Se incrementa sin precedentes la amenaza militar contra la RPDC.
					
					Se introducen sin cesar en la Peninsula Coreana los bombarderos y submarinos nucleares, el THAAD y otras propiedades estrategicas de EE.UU.
					
					El intento de EE.UU. de aplicar la hostil sancion economica anti-RPDC constituye otro factor de la tensa situacion.
					
					Al tomar la decision estrategica de que a la ilimitada amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., hay que responder obligadamente con el disuasivo nuclear, ya nos pusimos dispuestos a las sanciones de todo tipo.
					
					Segun la Carta de la ONU, el Consejo de Seguridad puede tratar las circunstancias correspondientes solo cuando se rompan la paz y seguridad internacionales o exista tal amenaza.
					
					En ningun articulo de la ley internacional ni en la Carta de la ONU existe la definicion de que la prueba de armas nucleares y otras o el lanzamiento de satelite artificial constituyen amenaza para la paz y seguridad internacionales.
					
					Pero, el Consejo de Seguridad definio a sus caprichos como "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" solo en cuanto a la prueba nuclear y lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC y aprobo la "resolucion" de prohibicion.
					
					En relacion con esto, la RPDC solicito oficialmente al Secretariado de la ONU la aclaracion de la legalidad de la "resolucion de sancion", pero el segundo no puede explicarla.
					
					Si un pais es digno miembro de la ONU, juzgaria con sensatez prestando atencion a la falta o no de la imparcialidad y moralidad del Consejo de Seguridad en la "resolucion de sancion".
					
					Si EE.UU. no hubiera hostilizado a la RPDC, la Peninsula Coreana no se habria convertido en la zona candente del mundo.
					
					El Presidente Kim Jong Un subrayo en el VII Congreso del PTC que EE.UU. debe anular su anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC, cambiar el acuerdo de armisticio por el convenio de paz y retirar del Sur de Corea sus tropas agresoras y equipos belicos.
					
					Y aclaro que el gobierno de la RPDC mejorara y normalizara las relaciones con los paises que respeten nuestra soberania y nos traten de manera amistosa aunque eran hostiles en el pasado.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. marcha en la direccion opuesta.
					
					Hace poco, cometio el peor acto hostil de ofender la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC cuestionando el inexistente "problema de DDHH".
					
					Esto significa la declaracion de guerra que niega la coexistencia con la RPDC, Estado soberano, y cerrar totalmente las puertas de dialogo con esta.
					
					Lo hemos previsto tambien y nos hemos preparado tanto para el dialogo como la confrontacion.
					
					Estamos dispuestos a mostrar que no podra estar a salvo si un pais grande intenta acosar y perjudicar a la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. pagara un precio horrible.

articles.title: Organos coreanos envian ofrendas florales a embajada de Laos
articles.content:
Organos coreanos envian ofrendas florales a embajada de Laos
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Los organos correspondientes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enviaron los dias 26 y 27 las ofrendas florales a la embajada de Laos en la RPDC para expresar las condolencias por el deceso del ex presidente de la Asamblea Nacional de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, Samane Vignaketh.
					Fueron colocadas al pie del retrato del difunto las ofrendas florales enviadas por la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Laos y la Direccion General de Trabajo con el Cuerpo Diplomatico. 
					
					En la ceremonia de condolencias estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, An Tong Chun, el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC Ryu Myong Son, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Ri Kil Song, el vicepresidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Laos y del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero Pak Kyong Il, el subdirector general de Trabajo con el Cuerpo Diplomatico Mun Jae Chol y otros funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto y firmaron el libro de condolencias.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la diplomacia vergonzosa de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la diplomacia vergonzosa de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Ignorantes de su miserable situacion, los compinches de Park Geun-hye andan pregonando por doquier del mundo la llamada "diplomacia en la cueva de tigre" que causa la burla y criticas dentro y fuera del pais. 
					Como es conocido por todo el mundo, la region del Nordeste Asiatico es la muy delicada donde se enredan los intereses de las potencias principales del mundo. Debido a la cada dia mas renida disputa por la hegemonia entre las potencias, la region acapara la atencion de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					En particular, a causa de la reciente decision de emplazamiento de THAAD que entrego el suelo surcoreano como base avanzada nuclear para la realizacion de la estrategia de EE.UU. de dominar Asia-Pacifico, se aumento mas el peligro de nueva guerra fria en la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico y se agudizan la guerra psicologica y la discrepancia entre EE.UU. y los paises perifericos. 
					
					Meten la nariz en esa disputa los compinches de Park hablando de la "diplomacia en la cueva de tigre" sobre los "Estados intimos del Norte (de Corea)". 
					
					Poniendo carteles baratos a sus irrealizables politicas diplomaticas como "proyecto de construccion de nueva Eurasia", "iniciativa de paz del Nordeste Asiatico" y "diplomacia en la cueva de tigre", los titeres surcoreanos trataron de hacer creer que ellos cumplen algun papel en la region donde se agudizan las disputas por la hegemonia.
					
					La actual mandataria y otras autoridades surcoreanas se movilizaron todas en la "diplomacia de presion al Norte" en contubernio con las fuerzas ajenas calificando de "provocacion" y "amenaza" las medidas de la RPDC de fortalecer su poderio militar con disuasivo nuclear como eje.
					
					Impotentes de alcanzar su objetivo criminal mediante la "sancion" anti-RPDC que desarrollaban con EE.UU. y otros "aliados", se entregaron a la "diplomacia de presion para atraer a los paises amigos y simpatizantes con el Norte".
					
					Al intervenir hace poco en la reunion cumbre Asia-Europa, Park mendigo el apoyo a su politica conflictiva anti-RPDC chismeando que "hay que inducir el cambio correcto del Norte" y "esforzarse por la ejecucion de medidas de sancion y la cooperacion en cuanto al problema nuclear del Norte". 
					
					Despues de tomar el poder, la traidora Park Geun-hye realizo en mas de 20 ocasiones el viaje al extranjero practicando la diplomacia de colaboracion anti-RPDC y pronunciando en escenarios internacionales las palabras enganosas como "acompanante estrategico" y "cooperacion internacional". Pero nadie considera a la horda traidora de Park como "colaboradora diplomatica" sino grupo de lacayos coloniales de EE.UU. y maniacos de enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Es merecido que Park, psicopata que no tiene ni la minima conciencia nacional, haya sufrido la verguenza en sus giras extranjeras para danar a la parte connacional. 
					
					El Sur de Corea se ha convertido en la colonia completa de EE.UU. debido a la diplomacia vendepatria y de dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras de los titeres surcoreanos y ahora esta sujetado a las potencias perifericas, lo cual hace recordar el periodo a finales del siglo 19 - a principios del siglo 20 cuando Corea se arruinaba por la pugna de potencias. 
					
					La actual crisis exterior de los titeres surcoreanos es el destino inevitable de los que mantienen la vida con el servilismo a grandes potencias y la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras sin tener su propia filosofia politica ni la postura independiente. 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye sera condenada al arruinamiento definitivo por sus actos vendepatrias.
